creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: sugar bowl, urn-shaped, covered, on square base, urn finial, bands of beading at rim and foot, and engraved shield topped by a bow knot and framed in swags of leaves, shield bears monogram [HM]
life_date: American (New York City and New Bern, North Carolina), died 1834
nationality: American (New York City and New Bern, North Carolina)
title: Sugar urn
